articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: Asian Games, Equestrian: India win historic dressage team event gold - The Indian Express
articles.description: Anush Agarwalla, Sudipti Hajela, Divyakriti Singh and Hriday Chheda win India's first Asiad gold in equestrian since 1982; Divyakriti’s father had to sell the family home in Jaipur to buy horses.
articles.content: Before they galloped to the top of the podium, they had to hop over innumerable hurdles. The pain of selling a house to fund careers, getting mocked at fund-raising meetings and doors getting shut, a… [+4699 chars]

articles.author: India Today World Desk
articles.title: She lost phone at 10,000-seat stadium. No sweat, said Asian Games volunteers - India Today
articles.description: Volunteers at the Hangzhou Asian Games recovered a misplaced, switched-off phone of a 12-year-old athlete from Hong Kong from one of the garbage bags. What's pleasantly surprising is they managed to retrieve the phone in a 10,000-seat stadium.
articles.content: Losing a phone can be a stressful experience, but losing it in a 10,000-seat stadium can be nerve-wracking. It happened to a 12-year-old chess player from Hong Kong participating in the Hangzhou Asia… [+1606 chars]
